us.zoom.sdk

Interface AccountService


  • public interface AccountService
    Account information service for Login user

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAccountEmail()
      Get current login in user's account email
      java.lang.String getAccountName()
      Get current login in user's account name
      java.util.List<Alternativehost> getCanScheduleForUsersList()
      Get user that has assigned you scheduling privilege by index
      MeetingItem.AudioType getDefaultAudioOption()
      Get current login in user's default audio option
      java.lang.String getThirdPartyAudioInfo()
      Get current user's own third party audio information
      boolean isSignedInUserMeetingOn()
      Check if current user has Only signed-in users can join meetings feature enabled.
      boolean isTelephonySupported()
      Check if current user has telephony feature enabled.
      boolean isThirdPartyAudioSupported()
      Check if current user has 3rd party audio feature enabled.
